content.detailedDescription: I am an avid sky watcher in the summer months. i am also an engineer and have lived near a muni aiport all my life .Hopkins int. airport is also 30 miles away. i have seen a lot of aircraft, this was not an aircraft. my fiance wanted to see a satellite(i use nasa.Gov. for known observations and times..Really miss the old j-pass!) so .. i'm watching and she was in my tool shop . a sat. comes up from the south going north.Very normal so i call her,show her where to look and she see's her first sat(maybe a 6.0 mag.)i have a long veiw over a golf course so i picked the sat up at maybe 20 deg. above the southern horizon ,as it reached 90 deg. another satellite (or so i thought) appeared from the west ,it looked like they would cross paths or close to impacting, original sat. continued in straight line and the second turned( aprox. 70 deg acute) exactly into that flight path approximate 1 inch(from our reference point)behind the known sat. and caught up to it. 3-5 seconds veiw was obsttructed by a tree.When they reappeared  only one light source was veiwable until it reached approx. 70 deg. from northern horizon.Second craft shot away back on original trajectory heading and very bright and very fast.I know roughly how fast the sat. was going  and whatever we saw was going at an incredible speed.I can't guess as to what our govt. might have that can manuever like that.Side note.I do research and cross reference to see if anything (including first sat.) was "supposed to there" and nothing was scheduled.Not surprising though because on nights i am anticipating a particular satellite i may see 20 of em!(actually saw 42 one night).
content.summary: Ufo investigates a satellite

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the roof of a friends apartment without 5 other people. we all witnessed this event. 

the first object to appear was a small red balloon sized glowing object that floated about the roofs of the houses 3 or 4 blocks from us. it traveled seeming only under power of the pendulum swinging motion it was making. every front swing it would move forward and every back swing it would stay still. we all commented on how weird it was, but just assumed it was some party favor run amok from someones back yard. 

this lasted maybe for 2 minutes before the light just fizzled and the whole apparatus disappeared from view. 

about 15 minutes later. so around 11 or 11-30 i want to say. a huge red light, the exact same color of the red bobbing light, came over the hill of buena vista park and moved fairly quickly in an arching motion upwards and over the city till it came to a complete stop over the city. it was quite startling and left everyone dumb-struck for a moment before we all became very excited at the prospect of what we were witnessing. 


it hung in the air for about 10 minutes, just sitting. at this time it was about the size of a planet in the sky. one of my friends remarked it looked like it was trying to be mars. 

it then slowly, very slowly descended about 40 feet in the air. stopped flickered the way the much smaller light had, then was gone from the night sky. 

we discussed the possibility of it being a helicopter, however the light was one single bright source, and was not blinking the way flight lights do. also silent no noise what so ever.

we tried to film it with our camera phones but nothing showed up on them.
content.summary: Red orb came over hill in sf, floated above city then flickered and disappear like a candle going out.

the first object to appear was a small red balloon sized glowing object that floated about the roofs of the houses 3 or 4 blocks from us. it traveled seeming only under power of the pendulum swinging motion it was making. every front swing it would move forward and every back swing it would stay still. we all commented on how weird it was, but just assumed it was some party favor run amok from someones back yard.

content.detailedDescription:
At that time i was just walking with my dog
when i was waliking  my ears were deamed foir sometime its noise was very harshded then i saw a sphere sahped ufo which

which is coming towrd us 

after sometime its stops and came backweard and then stop the again it move forward!

i was very suprisee for a some time and shocked that wahts that 

it suddenly invisible or gone ina high speed
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Its was justing moved two type forward then came back aftre some sec it agin go forward

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were driving west on mid-cities (picking ups late dinner) and approaching davis blvd when we saw a very bright yellow-white triangular pair of lights hovering over what we thought was approximately over smithfield road north of main street.  the oject was low enough that we initially thought it might be tower lights - but there are no tower lights in that area.  it is a residential area.  we took a right (north) on davis.  we pulled onto main street (west)off davis into a parking lot to get a better look.  as i pulled into a parking lot on main street the object(s) moved instantly over us (north to south) to an area over mid-cities and davis blvd.  we jumped back in my car, and drove across main street since a tree was now blocking our view.  as i pulled over across the street from my original location, what i can only describe as a vortex opened and the triangular shaped lights with a darker shape behind the lights that seemed to match the color of the sky disappeared.  there was a very brief but bright white flash just prior to the object disappearing.  there were two planes in the area flying north to south at the time of the incident.  the two planes were clearly planes - the object we saw was not.
content.summary: My daughter and i saw a bright object hovering over the area known as smithfield acres

content.detailedDescription:
Saw glowing object from my window like an airplane with landing lights on. seemed big so i went outside to observe. it was large and glowing where it was hard to focus on as it traveled from east to west in a straight line like an airplane. did not have blinking lights. there was no noise. it also appeared to have a "short lazer " kind of light what seemed like pointing at me the whole way. looked like a out-of-focus car tail light. the circle of the "beam" was about 1/3 the size of the object. i called the local airport tower right after and he said there were no aircraft in the area for the last half hour. it traveled from east to west so i know it was not the iss. which i watch the next night to confirm. i called a local astronomy teacher and he did not know either.
i would really like an answer.
content.summary: Glowing-out-of-focus mayse oval object

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed very bright multi-colored object in distance, in southwesterly direction approximately over san antonio when viewing from new braunfels.
my wife pointed it out to me, so i got my binoculars and watched for approximately 30 mins.
bright lights that simultaneously displayed what seemed like red, white and blue colors.  not flashing, not alternately in sequence, but glittery-like.  very vivid colors.  definitely not a star, but star-like.
at one point it had seemed to dim for a short period, then brightened.
it hovered then moved slightly in relation to a tree limb i was orienting by.  seemed to be moving away, but to far away to tell.
eventually the tree blocked my view entirely.

the next night my son told me the object was back.  it was approximately the same time of the night.  when i checked, it was appearing approximately at the same distance and elevation, but was now at more of a southerly direction, less to the west.
it was not moving, so i went inside and came back out a few times to check.  after about half an hour it was gone.
content.summary: Witnessed very bright multi-colored object in distance, in southwesterly direction approximately over san antonio when viewing from new braunfels.

content.detailedDescription: Early morning in nov 1972 i whent hunting in back of the property i lived at. as i crossed the flats i saw a huge amount of deer as if bottle necked at the foot of the hill. i kept crossing the flats and relized there were hundrads of deer they suddnly took off in differnt directions. i thought wow i never seen that many deer. i kept going up the hill to an orchard where i had seen a large buck days befor when i got half way up i had this over wellming feeking of tiredness. i could hardly keep my eyes open. i was in good physical shape and had slept well. this feeling of loseing consinoss stayed with me till i got to the orcard where i sat down on a tree stump there was about 5 inches of snow on the ground temp was in the 20s i layed the butt of the gun beside my leg hulding the barrell. i was thinking i cant fall asleep out here youll frezze to death. i closed my eyes my head was down iremeber seeing a bright like almost blinding it was white then red i cant go to sleep ill frezze i opened my eyes to an everment that was totally changed. i sat there looking kind of disorented wondering what had happend. is that the sun going down i just got here it cant be i stood up and thought it cant be but the sun was going down i heard a voice like my own tell me if you tell anyone theyll think your crazy i felt light headed alittle dizzy and i said i better get off the hill its getting dark i made my way across the flat and i heard the same voice repeating if you tell anyone theyll think your crazy. i pickrd my daughter up from the house next door which felt like i had just droped her off i went home made coffee and as i sat at the table i thought were did the day go then i relized if i fell asleep in 20 degree weather why wasnt i cold when i sat in the same spot for 7 to 8 hours. the killer thought is to this day i have great diffaculting falling asleep upright i have to be laying down. i have had over the course of my life several ufo sightings one which was turned in to a northwest universty and demed an unknown i would like to know what had happened to me that day i am not affraid to know the truth can you help me.
content.summary: Loss of time

content.detailedDescription: Was asleep at 1am and my dog woke me up growling at the window. i looked out and saw a red light over heywood area. at first thought it was a helicopter but hear no noise which at th distance i hear very loud. the object ascended and descended very quickly almost 'bobbing' up and down which confirmed wasnt a plane or helicopter (i used to work as a aircraft engineer in the royal navy mainly on the seaking and i would know what an aircraft looks like from tht distance and know it couldnt do the things that object did and with no apparent noise) and hovered for about 2minutes. i ran upstairs to wake up my parents and get a better view from their balcony window and the object was stil stationary and another red light appeared as if from nowhere and they both shot off to the east out of sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red light when got closer could see it was a disc. ascended and descended very quickly and shot off to the east

content.detailedDescription:
I was nearing the end of a flight from calgary canada, to london gatwick airport. i had a windowseat facing to the left of the aircraft. we had just flown over england, and had just turned from flying east along the southern coast to heading north towards the airport. we were around 500ft+ above the ground, but it was close enough for me to observe cities, roads etc from a great height. 

i was minding my business just looking out the window and a metallic sphere caught my eye. it was completely spherical and was traveling at a great speed. it did not appear to make a sound, have any visible form of propulsion it was simply a metallic sphere flying at a great speed, however fast enough to be observed.

the total time of the encounter lasted about 6 or 7 seconds.
i'd been watching ufo hunters recently and i thought that it must be weird to see something in the sky and instantly know it wasn't normal or that it didn't make sound. i wouldn't say i'm a skeptic but i just found it all very interesting. then i stumble across this sphere.

i can guarantee 100% that i was not mistaken for any kind of helicopter/aircraft. there was no propulsion and it was moving silent very fast. it's interesting because msot ufos caught in daytime are triangles over california. so to see a sphere is very different, and unlike a triangle, there is no relation of a spherical craft to any current aircraft models.

it is possible that the object was disc shaped but i was observing it directly from above (making it appear spherical) the craft moved at an incredible speed.
content.summary: Metallic sphere observed flying extremely fast in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 300 feet from my house at the barn. i heard a noise that sounded like a wind coming up, i looked up to see a v shape of white objects that at first i thought were  flock of birds. they went very quickly from south to north and curved to the west, there was no sound other than a light wind sound, a swish. we have alot of geese and other birds that fly even at night but they always make bird noises and they dont move that fast. they were like white spots in the sky in the shape of a v, but 3-4 thick. geese fly in a v with 1 bird in front of the other , this was like 3-4 birds flying next to each other making a chevron shape, like seargent stripes, made me shiver when it went by. it was a very clear night with little wind and no noise. for the first few minutes i kept thinking what kind of bird could that have been , they made no noise other than a wind noise and they moved very quickly in a tight formation, and tuned to the west as they went overhead. we live north of tinker afb and i see lots of planes flying all the time. this was no plane and not a flock of birds. freaked me out!!
never done this before but this was really weird thought you might want to know
content.summary: Chevron shaped flock of birds, too fast for birds

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting in our backyard smoking a cigarette when we saw a fast moving redish orange light traviling from the north east to the south east. the light stopped and hovered for about 10 seconds and then started to move again quickly further to the south east. seven minutes later the same light reappeared from the north east and continued to travel much slower to the south east and then disappeared. at first look we thought that the light we saw was a ball of some kind. when the light got into better view i jumped up and took a picture both times. when looking at the pictures after they were taken we saw that the lights were not actually a ball but a round shape and a yellowish white color.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a fast light traviling from the north east to the south east.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend where chilling at his back yard when we noticed a wierd light that was bigger then a star.It howered over the woods about 3 miles away,the light was sometimes yellow , sometimes white. it howered there for about 5 minutes then it made a bright flash, and kept on howering few seconds later a second light came out of the main light, the second one flew away to the left on a speed little bit faster then a plane.The second one kept on howering for about a minute, then it just landed in the woods.
content.summary: Howering over woods, then ejecting second craft, one flying away, second one landing.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work late one night. it almost looked like a blimp with multi color lights. it was very low and quiet for something that big. it sort of seemed to hover and fly slowly over town. i have never seen anything like it in my life except for that one time. it was in southern indiana, near a highway. not far from national guard.
content.summary: It was huge and hovered. it seemed to slowly move/hover over the town near a highway. i was driving home from work late at night.   i saw multi color lights. there was no sound and it was very low to the ground for something that big

content.detailedDescription:
I was flying a small remote control airplane with my dad just after sunset at my grandparents cottage- it became stuck in a tree, and in the process of removing it from the tree, i noticed a stationary floating orb hovering above their cottage. it appeared to be about 45 degrees above the horizon, and the size of a dime held at arms length, and glowing bright orange. the light appeared to be emanating from within the object. i hurried inside and gathered my grandparents, and my fathers girlfriend, a photographer, who failed to grasp to gravity of my request to "bring a camera". in the meantime, the object had begun slowing flying, drifting more like, geometric patterns. it was a very straight, strict and rigid flight pattern, apparently self propelled. it made no noise. it appeared to be flying low and close, though we could not determine its distance from us definitively, we were sure it couldn't have been farther than a couple of kilometres. after thirty seconds of uninterrupted observation, the object began shrinking (moving directly away from us), then took off on a trajectory like a well-struck golf ball, rapidly leaving the atmosphere, before disappearing with a flash of red light. 

my grandparents subsequently sighted similar objects a ear later, flying low over the lake, them flying west in formation.
content.summary: Hovering orb- flew geometric patterns, ascended rapidly on ballistic trajectory.

content.detailedDescription: i was out walking my dog and while she was doing her business i was looking up at the stars as i always do. what i saw looked exactly like the other surrounding faint stars. my first thought was that it was another airplane, but there was no flashing at all, it was just like a solid star -- except that it moved in spline-like patterns (quicker than any helicopter or plane could do), no trail, and occasionally stopping/hovering or moving in a straight line. i ran inside and grabbed my dslr (canon 60d) to try to get pictures and video, but sadly the light was too faint to be picked up by the sensor. eventually it went behind some clouds and i didn't see it again after that.
content.summary: Faint star moving in spline-like patterns

content.detailedDescription: We had just gotten home from my sister's house, my wife, myself, and my daughter were getting out of the car when i noticed a bright starlike object moving across the sky. it slowly veered right then left. at this point it appeared to be descending toward the horizon, but it faded as it hit about 45 degrees above the horizon. immediately when it disappeared, me and my daughter both seen a red object very rapidly blinking with a saturn like aura around it. it seemed to be coming from the opposite side of the sky from where the white light did, but it followed it even after the white light disintegrated. my wife seen the white light as well, however it was chilly so she hurried inside.
content.summary: Bright white light then chased by red saturn

content.detailedDescription:
Marbury,
i saw the same thing you stated, circle type sphere in my room facing east followed by lasers hidding and disappearing in mayan callendar pointing at the 3rd and 4rth arrow between 1:30 and 4:30 am, on the same day you saw it.  all week and week before i have seen theese lights and and lasers in my room.  also no dogs barking at neighborhood.  i try to stay awake but i cant. what is this.  strange noises are heard, i have notified police when noises are heard, oficers dont hear any thing. one more thing when noises are heard it seems like helicoper hovers over my home to distract my concentration from listening further at noise. 

34.437445, -117.332495

34.437445 -117.332495 

n34��� 26.2467', w117��� 19.9497'
content.summary: It seems like a hifi movie but, i thnk neighbors are trying scare me with laser videos projected in room.

content.detailedDescription: My son called me outside to look up at the sky. i watched for about five minutes. i went in to get a camera. i loaded the batteries in the camera and went outside to take a photo. the clouds passed under the some of the lights as both my son and i tried to take some pictures. my son said some helicopters passed by. soon they were gone. i don't know where they went. you can hardly see the photos.
content.summary: It would disappear over clouds, then reappear

content.detailedDescription: I went across the street to get my mail, one beautiful clear summer  night,(from a community mail box) and while retrieving my mail from the box, i noticed movement from above. what initially appeared to be the full moon ,was an object, glowing white like the moon, except it was solid white , with no grey or dark places on the surface , like the full moon displays, moving slowly , like a top fuel dragster staging toward the starting line. then , the object went across the entire sky ( from southeast to southwest) in one second , and flew into a small vertical shaped cloud and didn't come out of the other side. ironically , a little further west , was the real moon , and it was not full on this night , but perhaps just a quarter moon , and it was dark orange on this night. the entire incident lasted about 1 minute. i was initially frozen in place , realizing i was witnessing an authentic ufo incident, but when in ended so abruptly , i knew that this was a situation that i may well have been the only witness , and i really didn't want to be. so , that's why i really didn't care to make a report ,because i couldn't record or photograph the object , and the date and time wasn't as important to me as actually witnessing the event for myself , so i let it go. i guess if i thought bill birnes was going to interview me , i think i would have risked the negativity that comes with the reports.
content.summary: Saw an object that looked like the full moon slowly move into a position then cross the sky in one second and fly into a cloud and dissapear.

content.detailedDescription: It was the second or third night after the 1994 northridge, ca earthquake. because of being afraid to sleep indoors, arrangements were made to sleep in two of the cars that were parked on our driveway. i was babysitting my four neices, and nephew, all under 11 years old. my wife, and cousin decided to sleep in the minivan next to the other car with the kids in it. we positioned our selves as placing our heads towards the rear door of the van, so the van windows were above our heads. we all  fell asleep. for me i woke up feeling fear, and a sencse that something was trying to hurt the kids next to us. i looked out the van window, and saw three ufo's. the one in the middle was larger than the two on each side. at first they were hovering still, and lights were coming off the middle one first. on one side it was blue lights, in formation, and then the other side they where red. it was doing this for a few minutes, like communicating with the other ones. they were hovering like in small circle patterns, going forward and back. then in a fast forward motion the one in the center launched forward from the center and straight down to the horizon of my sight, the other two were moving side ways in a straight line really fast, zig zagging sideways, then the ufo on the right went to the left, and the one to the left went to the right, this happened repeatdly a few times. at this point i was so surprised, at what i was seeing that i woke up my wife and whisperred to her to look out the window, and describe to me if she could see any thing, she too then saw the same thing i did. to make sure i wasnt seeing things, i asked her which way the objects were moving, and each time it was correlating with what i saw, i asked of the lights, and the same lights flashed. then we woke up our cousin and asked him what and if he saw anything, as we all gained our composure, the ufos zig zagged up down side ways, it looked as if they were really close, and then pull off far away. one came really close to the roof line fo the house, then pulled back really fast. when the ufo in the middle beamed its red lights to the lefft ufo, that one would beam back red lights too, then this continued for a few seconds. this was really scary, i immediatley felt like they were going to try to abduct the small kids sleeping next to us in the cars, whats wierd is that i woke up feeling fear for the kids, and saw these ufo's. a few days later i was in the topanga hills, and i was in a grocery store, and saw there was an ad, in the bill board, asking if any one saw any ufo's. i never did call or go to the workshop. i was just wanting to know if any one else ever saw anything like this before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying saucers, two smaller ones on each side of the larger one. hovering, then bolting accross the sky returning back to where it started

content.detailedDescription: Saw object passing east to west. the object was above the clouds at about 20,000-30,000 ft. i think it was an asteroid.
content.summary: Asteroid passing

content.detailedDescription: I look at the sky from time to time but notice a slight flashing star (so i thought), than thought it was an air plane than possibly the space station. all of these possibilities were ruled out after some research, as an airplane doesn't hover or go backwards diagonal so quickly etc. the space station moves faster and usually in an east to west flight. this object flashes randomly and moves very randomly. it looks as if a flashing laser pointer is being pointed into the sky. its movements are not graceful and very erratic. i watched it for almost 4hrs (not knowing how much time has passed) had to get to bed but see it every night around 1am when the sky is clear. i plan to break out the telescope tonight to get a better look.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Has been seen every night (with no cloud cover) for a week now and starts around 1 am all through the night (until i pass out and stop watching it). stays in same general area. moves like a hummingbird would or laser pointer (best analogy i can give)

content.detailedDescription: We thought a large military helicopter must have flown over our house around 8:pm heading west from us.  around 9:00 it came by again, only i took my son out to see the "cool chopper".  when we stepped out to see it, we quickly realized this was not helicopter.  it was very thin, i referred to as "stick shaped" and very long.  very big and long.  it hovered briefly and then changed directions.  then i saw a bright round circle light in front of this big "helicopter" thing.  it appeared to be chasing the circle.  the helicopter "thing" was black, had no flashing lights as a plane or helicopter would have during night flight.  there was a smaller and brief red light circle.  i feel as if it changed quickly?  something changed but i can't explain what.  it was hard for my mind to comprehend what i was seeing.  my son started crying and ran in the house.  this was not a silent object.  one of the two things made a noise that shook house.  assumed helicopter....But this was no helicopter and did not see any propellers.  flew lower than aircraft would.  i asked neighbors if they saw, and they only heard but did not go out to look.  they also said it shook their homes.  i am positive it was chasing a round bright light that when i first saw i thought was a star.  but stars are not that low and moving!  my son thought the "helicopter" was shaped like a key.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Helicopter type sounding machine chasing bright round light

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:00 ct on sunday april 22, 2012 i witnessed a strange set of contrails going from sw to ne. a set of 5 contrails side by side and a couple minutes later found the contrail your show has expressed with the puff looking contrail  going from west to east turning north
content.summary: Strange contrails in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright planet size light that appeared from nowhere. 
i know, because i had just used my app on the phone and saw mars. and the light came from the same direction. 

the light came from the same angle on my right moving fast and across to the left towards me and getting bigger till stopping in front of me. 
at this time, it's size was as big as a moon. 
it was now a clearly visible bright thick ring with another ring of equal thickness and brightness inside. edges where not dull. it stopped for about 5 seconds. then slowly moved left getting smaller as it got higher in the sky till it dissapeared. 

i saw a fisherman that was about 20 feet from me on the ocean. he confirmed seeing the same thing. we have no pictures.
content.summary: Appeared as a bright planet like mars slowly getting closer getting bigger till the size of the moon. bright ring with and equal size ring inside. moved back into a planet size until it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright planet size light that appeared from nowhere. 
i know, because i had just used my app on the phone and saw mars. and the light came from the same direction. 

the light came from the same angle on my right moving fast and across to the left towards me and getting bigger till stopping in front of me. 
at this time, it's size was as big as a moon. 
it was now a clearly visible bright thick ring with another ring of equal thickness and brightness inside. edges where not dull. it stopped for about 5 seconds. then slowly moved left getting smaller as it got higher in the sky till it dissapeared. 

i saw a fisherman that was about 20 feet from me on the ocean. he confirmed seeing the same thing. we have no pictures.
content.summary: Appeared as a bright planet like mars slowly getting closer getting bigger till the size of the moon. bright ring with and equal size ring inside. moved back into a planet size until it vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were at friends home for dinner.  we live in the caribbean at cap cana a very quiet remote area on the beach surrounded by lots of trees and vegetation.  the villa is completely open and we were talking out back which backs up to the woods.  i was facing the woods and saw a very bright small white light flying around below the tree line.  zipping around very fast, i saw one, our friend looked when i pointed and he also saw a second one but i didn't.  they flew around quickly for about a minute and disappeared into the woods.  no, i was not drunk, one glass of wine.
the bright light against the pitch dark night made me notice it.
when i first saw the object, i had no idea what it could be...It was too big to be a firefly and moving differently, very quickly and abruptly changing directions.
it was a small, maybe golf ball size bright white light, not flashing.
i felt like it was a ufo immediately, since i am 56 years old and have never seen anything like it and it didn't fit into any other category.
lost sight of it by it simply zipping away into the woods.
content.summary: Two small white lights flying around the trees

content.detailedDescription: Photo taken by @themickyadams
content.summary: Ufo demonstrates active beam capabilities

content.detailedDescription: Was outside talking with my 17 year old son. saw light in the sky that looked like a man-made satelight.  type that can be seen after sunset.  it was moving in a straight line.  object then changed direction several times.  its speed stayed consent.  no light sources could be seen on the object.  but it was reflective.  object changed directions several times and would stop and hover.  object seemed to be very high up. also seemed to change altitude.  at one point we could make out the triangle shape of object. always seem to move with the "front" point going first.  only seemed to move sideways once.  movement did not mimic a aircraft.  there was no sound from object. the event last over an hour.  it would move all over the sky.  like it was surveying the town and surounding area.  we watched the object for just under an hour. at the end of sighting it simply returned to a straight flight path and went out of sight to the north.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object that looked like manmade satelight started changing direction and flight path.
